idea-plugin.name: External LAF switch
idea-plugin.description: This plugin allows changing IDEA look and feel externally from a script or any other application on the local machine.</br> Currently only allows to switch between "Darcula" and "IntelliJ" themes via shortcuts "dark" or "light".</br> Other LaFs must be referred by their full name.</br> To apply change write "dark" / "light" or full LaF name into `tcp://localhost:16666`.</br> Port can be changed via `autolafswitch.port` registry variable.</br>
